pkgmetadata.longdescription: # conduit :electron:Al lightweight framework for channeling the power of PyTorch Lightning.## InstallationConduit requires Python 3.8 or higher. To install the latest version from PyPI:```pip install -U 'torch-conduit[all]'```Unfortunately, you have to install the dependency `pytorch-lightning` manually:```pip install pytorch-lightning```This is because of dependency problems with pytorch.
